head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths PALMERIO, JAMES J.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths PALMERIO, JAMES J.

block.p: PALMERIO-James J. On July 15, 2000. Beloved brother of Maria A., Julia M. and Anthony J. Palmerio. Reposing at Albert R. Conner Colonial Funeral Home, 4955 Broadway, until Saturday 9:30 AM. Funeral Mass 10 AM at the Cabrini Chapel. Interment Cemetery of the Sacred Hearts of Jesus and Mary, Southampton, NY. Calling hours Friday, 2-4 and 7-9.
